name: Moon's Side
description:
My submission for the UofT GDDC Game Jam, Nov. 6-7!

The theme is 'Outside', so how about a game outside of our planet?

Navigate the rocky terrain to find lighter coloured rocks that will help you clear the way to your ship.

Background music: Venus by Gustav Holst

Also used Face Off as SFX, because it is a top-tier Rock meme.
